alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Madison; Orange (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:28PM EDT until June 16 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Madison County in northwestern Virginia... North central Orange County in central Virginia... Southwestern Culpeper County in northern Virginia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Orange, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Culpeper, Orange, Brightwood, Raccoon Ford, Stevensburg, Rapidan, Oakpark, Pratts, Aroda, Winston, Madison Mills, Mitchells, Fordsville, Twymans Mill, Leon and Locust Dale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
